resources.string: This app tries to cleanup URLs with GET query that tracks users, tap on the floating button to check saved rules.
Tap on the query text to remove entry, tap on this text to reset
App icon made by Smashicons from Flaticon
Handling short URL, this may take a few secs...
An error occurred when unshortening the URL.
Tap again to reset entries to default ones
Entries are reset to default ones, please reenter this page manually
Note: import will overwrite all the current rules!
